children.value: that sits above the typed core and enables:
strong typing internally while allowing flexible external interfaces

flowchart LR core[Typed Core
Domain + Services] plugins[Plugins] iface[Interface Layer
Contracts + Payload + SerDe] transport[Transport Layer] adapters[Adapters] core --> plugins core --> iface plugins --> iface iface --> transport transport --> adapters
Core does not depend on transport or serialization.
Interfaces mediate between typed domain and external world.

flowchart TD contracts[Contracts
Schema / WIT / OpenAPI] mapping[Domain ↔ DTO Mapping] payload[Payload Layer] serde[SerDe Strategy] versioning[Versioning] contracts --> mapping mapping --> payload payload --> serde contracts --> versioning
Transport becomes a thin envelope around payload.

flowchart TD
    http[HTTP]
    rpc[RPC]
    events[Events]
    ipc[IPC]
    cli[CLI IO]

    http --> payload[Payload]
    rpc --> payload
    events --> payload
    ipc --> payload
    cli --> payload

flowchart LR
    dto[DTO Payload]
    json[JSON]
    cbor[CBOR]
    msgpack[MsgPack]
    proto[Protobuf]

    dto --> json
    dto --> cbor
    dto --> msgpack
    dto --> proto

flowchart LR
    core --> dto
    dto --> json
    json --> http
No configuration required for most users.

sequenceDiagram
    participant UI
    participant Transport
    participant Interface
    participant Core
    participant Plugins

    UI->>Transport: Request
    Transport->>Interface: Envelope
    Interface->>Core: Typed input
    Core->>Plugins: Execute
    Plugins-->>Core: Result
    Core-->>Interface: Typed output
    Interface-->>Transport: Serialized payload
    Transport-->>UI: Response
Risk 5 — Debuggability loss with binary formats

children.label: Risk 5 — Debuggability loss with binary formats

children.value:
flowchart TD
    domain[Domain]
    contracts[Contracts]
    payload[Payload]
    serde[SerDe]
    transport[Transport]

    domain --> contracts
    contracts --> payload
    payload --> serde
    serde --> transport
Each layer evolves independently with compatibility guarantees.

flowchart LR
    schema[Schema Source]
    rust[Rust Types]
    ts[TS Types]
    docs[Docs]

    schema --> rust
    schema --> ts
    schema --> docs
